name: Mission Science Workshop
description: The Mission Science Workshop (MSW) has two bi-lingual community science centers that provide science enrichment activities to underserved youth from low-income communities, their families and schools. They work with public schools, community based organizations, and individuals in the community by providing programs that enrich and empower students' lives through engaging science education. At the moment they serve over 40 public schools, and dozens of community based organizations in the greate
